entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers changing to 60 percent chance of flurries this afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Temperature falling to minus 3 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM NST Tuesday 21 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 12.
